descriptionHtml:
Hello, the mod is a translation of a french mod. Sorry for my english.

Sorry for the trouble, i have a big stupidity, i have uploaded the french version, now i have uploaded the english version, sorry for the trouble.

Pour les français qui veulent le mod en français voici où vous pouvez le trouver : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21058

This mod adds 18 followers : 1 by city, 2 in the Dark Brotherhood, 4 in orc strongholds, 1 in High Hrothgar and 2 Dawnguard specific.


City, Clothing/Armor, Fighting style, Location

- Windhelm ; Stormcloak ; Battle axe ; standing near Ulfric\'s throne

- Riften ; thief ; dual wielding daggers ; The Ragged Flagon

- Markath ; Dwemer ; War axe, shield ; standing near the Jarl\'s throne

- Winterhold ; Mage ; destruction, restoration ; College of Winterhold in the Hall of the Elements

- Whiterun ; Wolf armor ; dual wielding war axes ; Jorrvask

- Solitude ; Imperial ; sword and shield ; standing near General Tullius

- Dawnstar ; Mythic Dawn ; destruction, restoration ; Silus Vesuius\'s House (level 20 required to enter the house)

- Falkreath ; thief ; dual wielding daggers ; In the Jarl\'s court

- Morthal ; Hjaalmarch Guard\'s Armor ; bow/sword/shield ; In the Jarl\'s court

- Dark Brotherhood (Falkreath) ; Dark Brotherhood ; Assassin ; standing near the Spider

- Dark Brotherhood (Dawnstar) ; Dark Brotherhood ; Assassin ; standing near Nazir


- Orc Strongholds -

- Dushnikh Yal ; Orc ; Orcish greatsword

- Largashbur ; Orc; Orcish war axe and shield

- Mor Khazgur ; Orc ; Two war axes

- Narzulbur ; Orc ; Battle axe


- High Hrotgar ; Greybeard ; Uses the Voice and spells


- Dawnguard -

- Fort Dawnguard ; Dawnguard armor ; Dawnguard warhammer and crossbow

- Castle Volkihar ; Vampire Royal Armor ; Usual vampiric spells, conjuration, destruction


The followers have perks and the companions are at your level.
The followers are marriable except for the Khajiit.

Install :
==============

Unzip the contents of new companions.zip to your Skyrim Data folder. Below is a list
of the default Skyrim installation locations:
C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data
or for 64-bit Windows:
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

Run the Skyrim Launcher and make sure the esp appears in Data Files and has
a tick next to it.

Start the game.

Uninstall :
=============

Delete all the files from the mod


Thank to Fallorn for correction
author: narugatsuto
